title: Fays - flared serif
content:
Can anyone ID the font used here? I checked Strayhorn and Optima - similar but not exact.

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [fays.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20060604042000/http:/typophile.com/files/fays.jpg) | 16.52 KB |
author: evan

comments.content: It reminds me of Poppl Laudatio, but the S doesn´t seem to match

On the other hand… it depends on which samples you refer to.  
 [Here](http://web.archive.org/web/20060604042000/http:/www.bertholdtypes.com/adobe_lib/080329000.html) is one that might match

Edit: After having had a closer look on their PDF-samples I must admit it is _not_ it! :-(
